testsuite.name: shoppingCart.AddToCartTests

testcase.name: 1) Valid add to cart (small quantity within stock)
2) Adding multiple times accumulates in cart
3) Attempting to add a product with ID that doesn't exist
4) Attempting to add more than available stock should fail

testsuite.system-out: Stock of product ID 1 updated to 8 Product ID 1 quantity in cart updated to 2. Successfully added product ID 1 to cart! Stock of product ID 1 updated to 8 Product ID 1 quantity in cart updated to 2. Successfully added product ID 1 to cart! Stock of product ID 1 updated to 5 Product ID 1 quantity in cart updated to 5. Successfully added product ID 1 to cart! Product not found in inventory. Not enough stock. Requested: 20, Available: 10
